modName: Modder Resource - Edge of Night - Capella
summary: Just a capella version of LOTR\'s Edge of Night I sang and uploaded. Feel free to use it if you like or to tell me how much I suck at singing lol. I felt the need to provide some kind of audio resource for songs for modders, since there appears to be a lacking in them. If demand wishes, I may do more.
descriptionHtml:
Just a capella version of LOTR\'s Edge of Night I sang and uploaded. Feel free to use it if you like or to tell me how much I suck at singing lol. I felt the need to provide some kind of audio resource for songs for modders, since there appears to be a lacking in them. If demand wishes, I may do more.

This also avoids copyright issues as it\'s a cover I\'ve sung for non-profit, and not the original tune.

If you wish my limited vocal talents for something, feel free to email me at Selvec@gmail.com, or send me a message on the nexus website.

A preview of this track can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/selvec/edge-of-night-cover
author: Selvec

files.name: Edge of Night A Hobbit Travelling Song - Capella - Tolkein Version
